description: This file defines the MainActivity class for an Android application. It sets up the main activity lifecycle, manages fragment transactions to display note list, note detail, and note editing screens, and implements navigation methods for transitioning between these fragments.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: The main activity class in the app, managing UI initialization and fragment navigation for note-related screens.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes the activity, sets up the main fragment container, and loads the note list fragment if this is a fresh launch.

methods.name: navigateToAddNote
methods.description: Replaces the current fragment with the note editing fragment to add a new note.

methods.name: navigateToNoteDetail
methods.description: Replaces the current fragment with the note detail fragment for a specific note identified by its ID.
